pages.text: Advanced tools for advanced players. Note that upon upgrading, the energy and enchantments of the tools will be kept. We will need lithium batteries: Grind clay, electrolyze clay dust, put lithium cells with silicon plates into assembling machine.
Works like a diamond pickaxe and diamond shovel in one!
Works like a faster diamond pickaxe, but only on non-ore blocks. Can also mine 3x3 areas (try sneak-use).
Works like a diamond axe, but without durability!
Aluminium dust can be smelted in a hot enough blast furnace!
